data.name: Angular
data.description: A powerful Javascript framework for building single page apps. Angular is open source, and maintained by Google.

data.name: Flutter
data.description: Flutter is Google's mobile app SDK for building beautiful, natively compiled applications for iOS and Android from a single codebase.

data.name: C-Sharp
data.description: C# is a multi-paradigm programming language encompassing strong typing, imperative, declarative, functional, generic, object-oriented (class-based), and component-oriented programming disciplines.

data.name: Java Spring Boot
data.description: Spring Boot is a development server for the Java platform. It provides a lightweight framework for building web and application applications.

data.name: Node JS
data.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

data.name: Python
data.description: Python is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language.

data.name: Java
data.description: Java is a general-purpose computer programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

data.name: SQL
data.description: SQL is a domain-specific language used in programming and designed for managing data held in a relational database management system (RDBMS).

data.name: HTML
data.description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

data.name: CSS
data.description: CSS is the main style sheet language used to style the content of Web pages.

data.name: JavaScript
data.description: JavaScript is a high-level, dynamic, untyped, and interpreted programming language.

data.name: SQL Server
data.description: SQL Server is a relational database management system (DBMS) developed by Microsoft.

data.name: MySQL
data.description: MySQL is a open-source relational database management system (DBMS) based on the SQL language.

data.name: MongoDB
data.description: MongoDB is a document-oriented database program. It is designed for easy readability and extensibility.

data.name: Docker
data.description: Docker is a containerization technology that enables developers to build, ship, and run applications with containers, on any platform with access to the same version of the operating system.

data.name: Git
data.description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.

data.name: GitHub
data.description: GitHub is a web-based hosting service for version control using Git. It offers access control and several collaboration features such as bug tracking, feature requests, task management, and wikis.

data.name: GitLab
data.description: GitLab is a Git-based project hosting service with a focus on simplicity and developer productivity.

data.name: Nest JS
data.description: Nest.js is a JavaScript framework for building cloud-native applications.

data.name: Sass
data.description: Sass is a stylesheet language that is interpreted by the Sass compiler.

data.name: Bootstrap
data.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework based on the responsive grid system.

data.name: PostGreSQL
data.description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system.

data.name: GraphQL
data.description: GraphQL is a query language for APIs and a runtime for fulfilling those queries with your existing data.
